item.title: Epidemic situation in Egypt
item.description: --- title: Epidemic situation in Egypt author: Ying Zou date: '2020-09-04' slug: epidemic-situation-in-egypt categories: [] tags: [] --- The overseas epidemic situation is getting worse. In this blog, I will make some simple data analysis on the world epidemic situation and the epidemic situation in Egypt.the total cases is 99280. xinhuanet This table Summarized the total confrimed cases by country (top 10).The total number of confirmed cases in Egypt ranks 31st among the total number of confirmed cases in the world.
